text: Consequently, following multiple women ’ s sexual misconduct allegations reported via The New York Times on Thursday ( Nov. 9 ), Louis C. K. ‘ s forthcoming film ‘ I Love You, Daddy ‘ will no longer see an immediate release. Additionally, the distributor released a brief statement claiming, “ The Orchard will not be moving forward with the release of ‘ I Love You, Daddy ; ” C. K. ’ s film that coincidentally involves an older filmmaker ’ s pursuit of an underage girl.
